description: Automatically end the conversation after a period of inactivity.
Number of seconds of silence needed to automatically close the conversation when auto-conversation-end is enabled.
Enable emotional tone in the assistant's voice.
Controls the speed of the assistant's voice (0.5 to 2.0).
Controls the precision of speech-to-text transcription (1: tiny.en, 2: small.en, 3: medium.en).

value: Use a lower pitch, speak slowly, and keep a relaxed natural pace.
description: Instructions for how the AI should speak and tone his voice using the speak module.
The OpenAI TTS voice to use. Must be one of: 'alloy', 'echo', 'fable', 'onyx', 'nova', or 'shimmer'. Strictly use one of these names. Tristan likes echo or onyx.
